Asubha Sutta：1．Asubha Sutta．-There are four modes of progress with reference to a monk who lives contemplating the unloveliness of the body，the repulsiveness of food，etc．His attainment，however，may be sluggish if his five indriyas （of faith，energy，etc．） are dull （A．ii．150f）．

2．Asubha Sutta．-The idea of the foul，if cultivated，leads to great profit．S．v．132．
